product_name: Patagonia Dynamite Duo Insulated Reversible Jacket - Boys' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Patagonia Dynamite Duo Insulated reversible jacket for boys provides options: the shell side provides slick protection while the furry fleece side is warm and cozy. Reversible design sports a protective recycled polyester shell on one side and cuddly soft fleece on the other; compressible insulation provides added comfort and warmth. Shell fabric is treated with a Durable Water Repellent for added protection from rain and snow. The Patagonia Dynamite Duo Insulated reversible jacket has handwarmer pockets on both sides; chinguard protects from zipper when jacket is zipped all the way up. 3-panel hood is comfortable and stays put. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia. Closeout.
short_description: The Patagonia Dynamite Duo Insulated reversible jacket for boys provides options: the shell side provides slick protection while the furry fleece side is warm and cozy.
